content.text: I'll add a "Powered by HCLSoftware" footer to the application. Let me first check the Layout component to see where the footer should be placed.
Now I'll add a footer component to the Layout. I'll place it after the main content area:
Now let me verify the build is successful:

input.description: Build the project to verify footer addition

content.text:
Perfect! The build completed successfully. I've added a "Powered by HCLSoftware" footer to the application. Here's what I implemented:

## Changes Made:

**Added Footer Section** in the Layout component:
- Placed after the main content area and before the Demo Mode Guide Panel
- Uses the same `bg-segro-charcoal` background as the navigation for visual consistency
- White text (`text-white`) with gray subdued text for "Powered by" (`text-gray-300`)
- The "HCLSoftware" text is emphasized with `font-semibold` and pure white color
- Centered content using flexbox
- Responsive padding that matches the rest of the layout (`max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8`)
- Added `mt-8` (top margin) to separate it from the main content

## Design Features:
- ✅ Consistent with SEGRO brand colors (charcoal background)
- ✅ Clean and professional appearance
- ✅ Centered alignment
- ✅ Responsive design that works on all screen sizes
- ✅ Appears on all pages throughout the application

The footer will now appear at the bottom of every page in the application, providing attribution to HCLSoftware.

## Changes Made:

**Added Footer Section** in the Layout component:
- Placed after the main content area and before the Demo Mode Guide Panel
